Posts.Content: Hi Cathy, i have just had my 3rd oral vinorelbine and up til yest i tolerated really well, i was on capecitabine for 18 months and thankfully had no troubling side effects, the only problem ive had since yest is ?muscle pain, wjich is annoying but i take brufen on top of my co codamol,Â  apart from that ive been fine and its lovely not having to think about taking tablets night and day! Good luck Annette
Posts.Title: Oral Vinorelbine (Navelbine)
